title: Boss-gege Excessive Spoiling - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Multiple Realms   Persistent Love Interests   Showbiz   Siblings Not Related by Blood   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: Táng Yǒu Cháng'ān   唐有长安
description:
CEO Leng Li: The sky has finally cooled down. It’s time for that person who bullied my sister to go bankrupt.

Jie Ao –xianzun (officer of Emperor Jie): The emperor is not allowing me to marry my junior sister? Good! Then, both of us are going to elope.

Overbearing Regent: This is my little princess! What do you mean by thousand pounds of gold and precious nobles? All of you kneel down to her!

Tong Su only wanted to complete her task of eradicating the scum male in order to get a chance to exact her own vengeance. However, this big BOSS, why do your eyes show such emotion towards me?>
